statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, address FROM customers WHERE email LIKE 'johndoe%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 5;
SELECT address FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE full_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM billing_history WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_history WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date FROM customers c JOIN billing_history b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id WHERE b.amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address, amount FROM customers c JOIN billing_history b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, transaction_date FROM customers c LEFT JOIN billing_history b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id WHERE b.amount IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Information;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer_Information WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT service_name, monthly_fee FROM Service_Plans WHERE monthly_fee < 50;
SELECT * FROM Billing_History WHERE amount_paid > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, total_amount FROM Billing_History WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Information WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer_Information WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Service_Plans WHERE plan_type LIKE '%gold%';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount_paid) AS total_paid FROM Billing_History GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, service_name, amount_paid FROM Customer_Information JOIN Service_Plans ON Customer_Information.service_plan_id = Service_Plans.plan_id JOIN Billing_History ON Customer_Information.customer_id = Billing_History.customer_id WHERE Billing_History.payment_status = 'paid';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, monthly_cost FROM service_plans ORDER BY monthly_cost DESC;
SELECT bill_date, total_amount, payment_status FROM billing_history WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY bill_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, street_address, city, state, zip_code FROM addresses WHERE state = 'CA';

SELECT * FROM billing_history WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT customer_id, plan_name, monthly_cost FROM customers JOIN service_plans ON customers.customer_id = service_plans.plan_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT customer_id, city, state, zip_code FROM addresses WHERE state = 'CA';

SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, price FROM service_plans WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_history WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY billing_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
